required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Propolis Effects in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Propolis Effects on Proteinuria and Kidney Function in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

clinical_study.source: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to determine the impact of Propolis on proteinuria reduction and protection of the glomerular filtration rate in chronic renal failure patients.

secondary_outcome.measure: Protection of the glomerular filtration rate
secondary_outcome.description: Maintaining glomerular filtration rate or inferior reduction to 5 ml per minute per 1.73 m2 of body-surface area from baseline.

arm_group.description: Patients will continue to receive standard treatment for their comorbidities, determined by the attending physician. Patients will receive 500 mg / day of the propolis extract in the form of tablets split in two daily doses.

Patients will continue to receive standard treatment for their comorbidities, determined by the attending physician. Patients will receive 500 mg / day of the propolis-placebo in the form of tablets split in two daily doses.

intervention.description: Patients will receive 500 mg / day of the propolis extract in the form of tablets split in two daily doses
Patients will receive 500 mg / day of the placebo in the form of tablets split in two daily doses

facility.name: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

patient_data.ipd_description: The data will be evaluated monthly by researchers at the scientific meetings of the department. Data from this study will be considered joint property of the parties involved. Researchers are, however, responsible for committing to make public the results.
